lines.text: The next time you fuck me, kiss me first!
Fuck the bonus.
Come on, kill me.
[spits blood in Randall's face, Randall knees him repeated in the stomach]
I'm not a criminal, I'm a soldier and I deserve to die, like a soldier.

[jams a grenade into Rahims mouth then wipes blood from his face with Rahim's scarf]
Your not a soldier, your a fly on a pile of shit.

[leading Rahim out to Lipton and other agents by the grenade pin]
Less than a week and still alive you owe me some money.

[nervous and unsure but acting calm]
Where shall I send the cheque?

[thinking of his friend Danny, making Lipton Uneasy]
Send the two-hundred and fifty thousand dollars to the widow of Det Sgt Danny Quintz, the bonus I'll pick up myself.

[turns to Malak who is dazed, grabs his jaw]
Fuck the bonus
[pulls the pin out]

[shouting]
Grenade

[fully aware of what's going to happen]
Randall...
[Malaks head explodes]
We've been seeing each other for six months now.
Six months? Six fucking months? That's a goddamn sivler anniversary for you!

[answering phone]
Hello, Morrison, City Desk...

[calculating]
This is Malak Al Rahim.
[laughing and typing name into computer]
Let me save you some confusion, Mr. Morrison, there are going to be a number of people phoning tonight to claim responsibility for what I am about to do...

[reading from computer search]
Malak Al Rahim is supposed to be in South Yemen... how do I know it's really you?

[pressing his hand print onto the phones glass window]
You'll know it's me... I'm standing outside a Fox Cinema...
[blows up the cinema]
